name: Hide and Peek
description:
SOUND ON! GAME MAY BE EASIER TO PLAY IN BROWSER THAN THROUGH ITCH.IO APP arrow keys to turn. avert your eyes to move.

made in a week for the HPS1 Summer of Shivers Game Jam

make your way through the house, grab the key, and head out. don't be seen.


Stuck on how to play ?

Credits: 

Jonny Hopkins - concept, programming, modeling, some sound

Patricia - Special Thanks, Game Name

Music - Immorpher

Screen Space Effects - URP PSX

Sound Effects - Sounds Recorded, Free High Quality Sound

Some Graphics - OnlyGfx
